channel.title: Error Unpacking Interfaces: Error 95

item.title: Error Unpacking Interfaces: Error 95
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

I get this error when loading my client, yes, theyâ€™re in the right directory, yes, I increased the interface array,
yes, I added optionTab(); under [COLOR=Red]aClass44 = aClass44;[/COLOR]

When I comment out [COLOR=red]optionTab();[/COLOR], my client loads as normal, so I know it has to deal with the [COLOR=red]optionTab()[/COLOR] method.

What I added;

public static void addToggleButton(int id, int bID, int bID2, String bName, String tT, int configID, int aT, int configFrame) {
		Class9 tab = addInterface(id);
		tab.anInt236 = id;
		tab.anInt236 = id;
		tab.anInt262 = 5;
		tab.anInt217 = aT;
		tab.anInt214 = 0;//anInt214
		tab.aByte254 = 0;
		tab.anInt230 = -1;//anInt230
		tab.anIntArray245 = new int[1];
		tab.anIntArray212 = new int[1];
		tab.anIntArray245[0] = 1;
		tab.anIntArray212[0] = configID;
		tab.anIntArrayArray226 = new int[1][3];
		tab.anIntArrayArray226[0][0] = 5;
		tab.anIntArrayArray226[0][1] = configFrame;
		tab.anIntArrayArray226[0][2] = 0;
		tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(bID, bName);
		tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(bID2, bName);
		tab.anInt220 = tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207.anInt1440;
		tab.anInt267 = tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207.anInt1441;
		tab.aString221 = tT;
	}
	
	public static void addSprite(int id, int spriteId, String spriteName) {
		Class9 tab = aClass9Array210[id] = new Class9();
		tab.anInt236 = id;
		tab.anInt236 = id;
		tab.anInt262 = 5;
		tab.anInt217 = 0;
		tab.anInt214 = 0;
		tab.aByte254 = (byte)0;
		tab.anInt230 = 52;
		tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_207 = CustomSpriteLoader(spriteId, spriteName);
		tab.aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_260 = CustomSpriteLoader(spriteId, spriteName); 
		tab.anInt220 = 512;
		tab.anInt267 = 334;
	}
